704682f-b.text:
Grand Avenue, north from Lefferts Place. View 1 shows the west side of the avenue and view 2 the east side. One the latter is the Nazarene Congregational Church.
P.L. Sperr
August 28, 1941
704682f-b.folder: Grand Avenue & Lefferts Place, Brooklyn, NY

704682f-a.text:
Grand Avenue, north from Lefferts Place. View 1 shows the west side of the avenue and view 2 the east side. One the latter is the Nazarene Congregational Church.
P.L. Sperr
August 28, 1941
